channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Best hotel rewards programs in the world: Which one is right for you?
item.description: What are the best hotel loyalty programs? Learn more about the rewards offered at 10 major hotel programs so you can decide which one is right for you...

item.title: JetBlue ends loyalty partnership with Japan Airlines — award redemptions conclude in March

item.title: Bilt Cash launches Jan. 1: How to earn and redeem the new rewards currency
item.description: Bilt Cash arrives in 2026, giving members flexible rewards on top of points. Learn how to earn, spend and access exclusive perks with Bilt Cash.

item.title: Love it or leave it: TPG lead writer Katie Genter’s airline and hotel elite status plans for 2026

item.title: How credit cards can help you kick off your New Year’s resolutions
item.description: Whatever your resolutions for 2026 are, your credit cards can help. Here's how you can use them to earn bonus rewards as you strive to reach your 2026...
